info.about:
You see a blank gml-raptor project here.
Only 1 Font, no Button Sprites, this is all default.
Hover over elements, some of them
offer a tooltip that tells you,
where you can find the code in the project
for that specific item.

Oh, btw, the font is set as scribble_font_set_default in the Game_Configuration script!
